summary.span: 表示一个 Word 文档中的托管控件集合，该文档已通过使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具进行自定义。

span.span: Represents a collection of managed controls on a Word document that has been customized by using the Office development tools in Visual Studio.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法和属性来管理 Word 文档中的控件。Use the methods and properties to manage controls on a Word document. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Adding Controls to Office Documents at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time)。For more information, see [Adding Controls to Office Documents at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time). 若要在文档级项目中获取对象, 请在项目中使用`ThisDocument`类的属性。To get an object in a document-level project, use the property of the `ThisDocument` class in your project. 若要获取应用程序级项目中的对象, 请使用在运行时以编程方式创建的主机项的属性。To get an object in an application-level project, use the property of a host item that you create programmatically at run time. 有关更多信息，请参见 [Extending Word Documents and Excel Workbooks in VSTO Add-ins at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time)。For more information, see [Extending Word Documents and Excel Workbooks in VSTO Add-ins at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/extending-word-documents-and-excel-workbooks-in-vsto-add-ins-at-run-time). 下表显示了如何使用成员执行一些与文档上的控件相关的常见任务。The following table shows how to use members to perform some common tasks related to controls on documents. |任务Task|操作Action| |----------|------------| |向文档添加控件。Add a control to the document.|使用 Add*ControlName*方法之一。Use one of the Add*ControlName* methods. 例如, 若要添加内容控件, 请使用方法。For example, to add a content control, use the method.| |从文档中删除控件。Remove a control from the document.|使用 方法。Use the method.| |确定控件是否在集合中。Determine whether a control is in the collection.|将控件或其名称传递给方法。Pass the control or its name to the method.| |获取集合中的控件的索引。Get the index of a control in the collection.|将控件或其名称传递给方法。Pass the control or its name to the method.| |从集合中获取一个控件。Get a control from the collection.|向属性传递控件的索引或名称。Pass the index or name of the control to the property.| [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可以在运行时在文档的当前选定内容中添加一个新的。Use this method to add a new at the current selection in the document at run time. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Adding Controls to Office Documents at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time)。For more information, see [Adding Controls to Office Documents at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将一个新添加到文档的开头。The following code example adds a new to the beginning of the document. 显示 Microsoft Office Word 提供的公式构造块。The displays equation building blocks that are provided by Microsoft Office Word. 此版本适用于文档级自定义项。This version is for a document-level customization. 若要使用此代码, 请将其`ThisDocument`粘贴到项目的类中, 然后`AddBuildingBlockControlAtSelection`从`ThisDocument_Startup`方法调用方法。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisDocument` class in your project, and call the `AddBuildingBlockControlAtSelection` method from the `ThisDocument_Startup` method. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlReference#1](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference/CS/BuildingBlockGallery.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlReference#1](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference/VB/BuildingBlockGallery.vb#1)] 此版本用于针对 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 的应用程序级外接程序。This version is for an application-level add-in that targets the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]. 若要使用此代码, 请将其`ThisAddIn`粘贴到项目的类中, 然后`AddBuildingBlockControlAtSelection`从`ThisAddIn_Startup`方法调用方法。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisAddIn` class in your project, and call the `AddBuildingBlockControlAtSelection` method from the `ThisAddIn_Startup` method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可添加基于文档中的本机内容控件的新。Use this method to add a new that is based on a native content control in the document. 当您在运行时创建, 并且您想要在下次打开文档时重新创建同一个控件时, 这非常有用。This is useful when you create a at run time, and you want to recreate the same control the next time the document is opened. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Adding Controls to Office Documents at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time)。For more information, see [Adding Controls to Office Documents at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time). ## Examples 下面的代码示例为已在文档中的每个本机构建基块库创建一个新的。The following code example creates a new for every native building block gallery that is already in the document. 此版本适用于文档级自定义项。This version is for a document-level customization. 若要使用此代码, 请将其`ThisDocument`粘贴到项目的类中, 然后`CreateBuildingBlockControlsFromNativeControls`从`ThisDocument_Startup`方法调用方法。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisDocument` class in your project, and call the `CreateBuildingBlockControlsFromNativeControls` method from the `ThisDocument_Startup` method. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlReference#3](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference/CS/BuildingBlockGallery.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlReference#3](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference/VB/BuildingBlockGallery.vb#3)] 此版本用于针对 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 的应用程序级外接程序。This version is for an application-level add-in that targets the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]. 若要使用此代码, 请将其`ThisAddIn`粘贴到外接程序项目中的类中, `CreateBuildingBlockControlsFromNativeControls`然后从`ThisAddIn_Startup`方法调用方法。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisAddIn` class in your add-in project, and call the `CreateBuildingBlockControlsFromNativeControls` method from the `ThisAddIn_Startup` method. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn#3](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn/CS/BuildingBlockGallery.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn#3](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn/VB/BuildingBlockGallery.vb#3)] 下面的代码示例为用户添加到文档中的每个本机构建基块库创建一个新的。The following code example creates a new for every native building block gallery that the user adds to the document. 此版本适用于文档级自定义项。This version is for a document-level customization. 若要使用此代码, 请将其`ThisDocument`粘贴到项目中的类。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisDocument` class in your project. 对于C#, 还必须将`ThisDocument_BuildingBlockContentControlAfterAdd` 事件处理程序附加到`ThisDocument`类的事件。For C#, you must also attach the `ThisDocument_BuildingBlockContentControlAfterAdd` event handler to the event of the `ThisDocument` class. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlReference#4](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference/CS/BuildingBlockGallery.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlReference#4](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference/VB/BuildingBlockGallery.vb#4)] 此版本用于针对 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] 的应用程序级外接程序。This version is for an application-level add-in that targets the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]. 若要使用此代码, 请将其`ThisAddIn`粘贴到项目中的类。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisAddIn` class in your project. 此外, 还必须将`ActiveDocument_BuildingBlockContentControlAfterAdd`事件处理程序附加到活动文档的事件。Also, you must attach the `ActiveDocument_BuildingBlockContentControlAfterAdd` event handler to the event of the active document. [!code-csharp[Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn#4](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn/CS/BuildingBlockGallery.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn#4](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ContentControlReference_AppLevelAddIn/VB/BuildingBlockGallery.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可在运行时添加基于文档中的本机内容控件的新。Use this method to add a new that is based on a native content control in the document at run time. 当您在运行时创建, 并且您想要在下次打开文档时重新创建同一个控件时, 这非常有用。This is useful when you create a at run time, and you want to recreate the same control the next time the document is opened. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Adding Controls to Office Documents at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time)。For more information, see [Adding Controls to Office Documents at Run Time](/visualstudio/vsto/adding-controls-to-office-documents-at-run-time). ## Examples 下面的代码示例为文档中的每个本机纯文本控件创建一个新的。The following code example creates a new for every native plain text control that is in the document. 此版本适用于文档级自定义项。This version is for a document-level customization. 若要使用此代码, 请将其`ThisDocument`粘贴到项目的类中, 然后`CreateTextControlsFromNativeControls`从`ThisDocument_Startup`方法调用方法。To use this code, paste it into the `ThisDocument` class in your project, and call the `CreateTextControlsFromNativeControls` method from the `ThisDocument_Startup` method.
